channel.title: MugorPkz; Looking For Development Team:
channel.description:
Dear Members,
I am currently under construction of creating a server. The server will be a 508 but as you can tell by the name, the server will be a 'Pking' server. At the moment all i have got is a forum. I know people are thinking this is going to fail, but personally in my own view you should create a forum first. In my development's team i need; 2 Moderators, 2 Global Moderators 1 or 2 Coders And 2 GFX Designers.. I am under a consuming question of hiring an adminstator but please check back for updates. Below is some pictures of the forum to prove that the forum and server are going ahead: (sorry there are none of the server as most view's would like to view the server more)
[img]http://img44.imageshack.us/img44/3900/38292208.png[/img]
[img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/1238/92949390.png[/img]
